comments: He is a tough teacher who requires alot of you. If you work hard you will do well. He is always available for help.

Prof is thorough with covering all of the material in the texts. He gives several outlines. His exams are based entirely on those. Memorize it! Manditory attendence. Quizzes are ambiguous. Changes format of exams every time. You must complete reading or you will fail every assignment. He thinks he is an English Prof. Grades on grammar & spelling

This is the WORST PROFESSOR EVER!!! Gives you TONS of USELESS reading and tells you to remember outlines that dont even appear on the exams! Lectures are EXTREMELY BORING and deducts points from grade after missing just 2 classes!
